definitions.definition: The herb wolfsbane , or monkshood ; any plant of the genus Aconitum , all the species of which are poisonous.
An extract or tincture obtained from Aconitum napellus , used as a poison and medicinally .

main_definition: The herb wolfsbane , or monkshood ; any plant of the genus Aconitum , all the species of which are poisonous.
secondary_definitions: ( toxicology ) An extract or tincture obtained from Aconitum napellus , used as a poison and medicinally .
